data.name: Cursor - Skyrim
data.description:
Skyrim Cursor - Global.
Cursor only. (No :hover or :pointer).

For Skyrim cursor with additional (black) pointers (:hover & :active), see:
https://userstyles.org/styles/175565/cursor-skyrim-kmv

32x32.
Integrated into CSS (base64) - No external mirror utilized.

Source:
1) https://tes-mods.fandom.com/wiki/The_Elder_Scrolls_Mods_Wiki
2) https://images.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110213131405/elderscrolls/es/images/9/91/CursorSkyrim.png

Using Stylish will remove editor errors:
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact:
https://www.reddit.com/r/KMV/

user.name: KMVerum
user.about:
/*

NOTICE:

All my Themes are designed for Stylus;
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

I stopped using Stylish in 2017 when the owner sold us out, and began selling user data:
https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/53233/announcement-to-the-community

Stylus became the fork of Stylish when this happened.

Stylish has since altered their code to the point where many old CSS standards aren't accepted anymore.
This is especially troublesome on Chrome.

As an example to this:
-My YouTube Dark Theme (as of Oct. 2019), consisted of 1459 lines and works fine in Stylus, but had 866 errors in Stylish.

The time and effort needed to correct all errors on an already working code is a no-go.
More importantly; Privacy is of much greater concern to me.

Description from Stylus website;
"Any and all analytics, telemetry, and data-collection have been removed completely."

PS; If you're on Firefox; They've done pretty much the same thing.
-Waterfox is the alternative;
https://www.waterfox.net/

My themes also work on Tor.

*/

data.name: Wccftech Dark Theme
Yahooニュース 夜間用ダークテーマ
data.description: 夜間の閲覧時に目に優しい、ダークテーマです。背景をダークグレー、文字をライトグレーにしています。広告部分などの色設定はいじっていないため、『Yahooニュース サイドペイン非表示』と共に使うことを前提としています。

data.name: Yahooニュース 背景色グレー化
data.description: Yahooニュースの背景色を目にやさしいグレーに変更します。広告部分などの色設定はいじっていないため、『Yahooニュース サイドペイン非表示』と共に使うことを前提としています。

data.name: Zimbra Dark Theme
Dark theme new.rro.ch, epaper.walliserbote.ch etc.
data.description: Dark theme for new.rro.ch, epaper.walliserbote.ch, abo.walliserbote.ch and www.1815.ch A dark theme for the news app & services. Compatibility Tested on browsers: Firefox, Chrome, Edge, Opera Any issues, let me know and the theme will be updated ASAP - just ensure you are using the latest version at all times

data.name: Google Dark Material
data.description:
Not all sites of Google, but the essential ones (Search, Map, Image, Translate,...).

Use 4 Google's colors for easier navigating.

data.name: Clean Dark Indavideo
data.description:
Dark, clutter-free theme for indavideo.hu.

I removed most of the UI to be as clean and minimalistic as possible. If you only search and watch videos this theme is for you!

data.name: Eldarya Map - Eldarya Mapa Poszukiwań
data.description:
Style shows on the map items that can be found in the specific locations.
Style is global, it works on every language version of Eldarya.
--------------------------------------------------------
Styl pokazuje na mapie przedmioty możliwe do znalezienia w danych lokacjach.
Styl jest globalny, działa na każdej wersji językowej Eldaryi.

data.name: Fastmail
data.description: An opinionated dark theme for the default (two-column) view in fastmail. Select the dark theme in settings first.
